sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.c_id , A.c_parentid , A.c_position , A.c_left , A.c_right , A.c_level , A.c_title , A.c_type /* user filed add point*/ ,A.C_USER_ID AS userId ,A.C_NOTE_DETAIL_ID AS noteDetailId ,A.C_NOTE_TYPE_CODE AS noteTypeCode ,A.C_RECE_DISP_DT AS receDispDt
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_USER_ID = #userId# AND A.C_NOTE_TYPE_CODE = #noteTypeCode# ORDER BY A.C_RECE_DISP_DT DESC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_USER_ID AS userId , C_NOTE_DETAIL_ID AS noteDetailId , C_NOTE_TYPE_CODE AS noteTypeCode , C_RECE_DISP_DT AS receDispDt FROM T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_TYPE = NVL(#c_type#, C_TYPE) , C_TITLE = NVL(#c_title#, C_TITLE) , C_USER_ID = NVL(#userId#, C_USER_ID) , C_NOTE_DETAIL_ID = NVL(#noteDetailId#, C_NOTE_DETAIL_ID) , C_NOTE_TYPE_CODE = NVL(#noteTypeCode#, C_NOTE_TYPE_CODE) , C_RECE_DISP_DT = NVL(#receDispDt#, C_RECE_DISP_DT) WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_USER_ID AS userId , C_NOTE_DETAIL_ID AS noteDetailId , C_NOTE_TYPE_CODE AS noteTypeCode , C_RECE_DISP_DT AS receDispDt FROM T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_USER_ID AS userId , C_NOTE_DETAIL_ID AS noteDetailId , C_NOTE_TYPE_CODE AS noteTypeCode , C_RECE_DISP_DT AS receDispDt FROM T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* enterMyselfFixLeftRight */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#) , C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#) , C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* addMyselfFromJstree */ INSERT INTO T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER ( C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL ) VALUES ( S_USER_NOTE_BY_USER.NEXTVAL, #c_parentid#, #c_position#, #c_left#, #c_right#, #c_level# )
/* addMyselfFromJstree SEQ */ SELECT S_USER_NOTE_BY_USER.CURRVAL AS SEQ FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: /* alterNodeType */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_TYPE = #c_type# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* fixCopyIF */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_POSITION = #fixCopyPosition# WHERE C_ID = #fixCopyId#
/* fixCopy */ UPDATE T_USER_NOTE_BY_USER SET C_PARENTID = #fixCopyId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
